short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert YouTube Transcripts to Anki cards
short.es: Convierte transcripciones de YouTube tarjetas de Anki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloads the transcript of a YouTube video to a CSV or send it directly to Anki as a new deck, using the original audio/video of the current sentence and without having to download the original media.

Instructions -> https://github.com/dobladov/youtube2Anki#send-to-anki-ankiconnect
long.es:
This extension adds a star button to the transcript allowing to download the sentences as cards (csv) that can be imported into Anki, allowing to use the original audio/video of the current sentence.

Instructions -> https://github.com/dobladov/youtube2Anki
